messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Kitchen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: GET MEEMED YA CUCKLOID HILLARY VOTERS. Its the final memedown fam.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.
